Text.Page:
Stolen every evidence right in front of success, and allies couldn't help feeling deserted.
Dougal advised to let Highwatch citizens know what happened in the Vault of Oriyn.

Rhodos is in the grip of "furious grief" right now. We aren't likely to get anything coherent out of him for a while.

Let's tell Dougal what happened, and he'll have advice about what to do next."That is an idea."

That doesn't make any sense! Madat was helping us get into...into the city...

Damn it! All of that was never about breaking the siege! Dakuryon just used us to get close to Verikam!

We need to rethink all our plans..."Okay."
